name: Dungeons Over Dungeons
description:
DoD is a Dungeon based game, where you get to fight monsters and bosses in each level.
your goal is to clear each level and earn currency, levels, and upgrade your skills.
this is a play test to see how things going.
Current classes are:
Marksman > has AR rifles, Semi Rifles, SMGs, Shotguns, Snipers, and Pistols.
Archer > Bow 
Mage>  no weapons only casting magical spells
Swordsman > Swords, (and shields will be added later on)
Current Maps:
Cave > first level in the cave has some Ranged and Melee Monsters and a final boss.
if you downloaded the game and played the test, please share your opinion or any bugs you found, what would you like to see or to add.
